thread.title: Timothy J Winter
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Timothy J Winter

author: Timothy J Winter
title: Timothy J Winter
text: I am not a plumber by any means and need to provide the maintenance to our Super DOS 2.0 Chlorine injector system. I have been very hesitant to perform the maintenance for fear of leaks. In working with Clemente, he has assured me that he will stay with me on the phone during the maintenance to ensure it is completed correctly. I have been able to perform the maintenance as the instructions have been clear enough and with Clemente's help, we are in great shape now.
